abstract: Mentor Graphics urged investors on Tuesday to vote against a proposal by one of its largest shareholders, Carl C. Icahn, and also changed its bylaws
snippet: Mentor Graphics urged investors on Tuesday to vote against a proposal by one of its largest shareholders, Carl C. Icahn, and also changed its bylaws
lead_paragraph: Mentor Graphics pushed investors on Tuesday to vote against a proposal by its largest shareholder, Carl C. Icahn.

headline.main: Mentor Pushes Shareholders to Reject Icahn’s Proposal
